donateGuest.title: How to donate without logging in
donateGuest.summary: You can donate as a guest and still support a campaign securely.
content: Open a campaign and tap Donate Now.
Choose your ETB amount and enter your name. Email is optional but helps with receipts and updates.
Submit the donation. If you want, attach a receipt image as proof.
Create an account later to track your impact from the dashboard.

donationReceipts.title: How to track donations and receipts
donationReceipts.summary: See totals and donation history from your dashboard after you log in.
content: Log in and open your dashboard to view Total Donated and recent activity.
Receipts are attached to successful donations when provided.
If a receipt is missing, submit your donation with a proof image next time for faster tracking.

organizerVerification.title: How to verify your organizer account
organizerVerification.summary: Verification protects donors and keeps campaigns trustworthy.
content: Go to Organizer Verification from your dashboard.
Upload your national ID (front and back) and a clear live photo.
Submit the form and wait for approval. You will see the status in your account.

campaignDraft.title: How to create a campaign draft
campaignDraft.summary: Start a campaign and save progress as you go.
content: Open Start Campaign and fill in the title, story, and goal.
Add a deadline if you want the campaign to auto-close on a specific date.
Upload media to make your campaign more credible and engaging.
Launch when ready, or keep editing until you are satisfied.

campaignUpdates.title: How to update your campaign story
campaignUpdates.summary: Keep donors informed with clear progress updates.
content: Open your campaign from the dashboard and edit the story or goal as needed.
Add new media to show progress and build trust.
If you need to pause or delete, submit a request from the dashboard.

campaignClosure.title: When does a campaign close?
campaignClosure.summary: Campaigns close when the deadline passes or when the goal is reached.
content: If you set a deadline, the campaign closes automatically on that date.
If the goal is reached first, the campaign is marked as a success story and closes.
Closed campaigns no longer accept donations.

securityBasics.title: How we keep donations secure
securityBasics.summary: We use secure sessions, protected routes, and controlled access.
content: Authentication protects personal data and donation history.
Organizer verification reduces fraud risk for campaigns.
We monitor activity and provide support for suspicious issues.

reportIssue.title: How to report suspicious activity
reportIssue.summary: Contact support with details so we can help quickly.
content: Use the Report an issue action in the Help Center.
Describe the campaign and any evidence you have.
Our team will review and respond to your report.

accountAccess.title: Account access and recovery
accountAccess.summary: Log in securely and recover access if needed.
content: Use the login page with your email and password.
If you forgot your password, use the Forgot Password link.
Contact support if you cannot regain access.

faqs.q: How do I verify my email with OTP?
faqs.a: After signup, we send a 6-digit OTP to your email. Enter it on the verification page to activate your account.

faqs.q: Can I donate without an account?
faqs.a: Yes. You can complete a donation as a guest. Create an account later to track receipts and impact.

faqs.q: Where can I see my total donated?
faqs.a: Log in and open your dashboard to see Total Donated and your donation timeline.

faqs.q: What happens when a campaign reaches its goal?
faqs.a: The campaign is marked as a success story and closes automatically to new donations.

faqs.q: What happens when a campaign deadline passes?
faqs.a: The campaign closes automatically and no longer accepts donations.

faqs.q: How do I report a problem?
faqs.a: Use the Report an issue action in the Help Center to email our support team.

privacy.title: DONATIONS PLATFORM PRIVACY POLICY
privacy.intro: This Privacy Notice for Donations Platform describes how and why we might access, collect, store, use, and/or share your personal information when you use our services.
privacy.summary_text: We process account information, identity verification data, and technical usage data. Because we handle medical-related documentation, we handle sensitive personal data with enhanced encryption. We use AI for fraud prevention and connect donors with verified beneficiaries.

sections.s1_content: We collect Account Information (name, email), Identity Verification Data (Gov ID, medical docs, biometrics), Financial Data (transaction history via Stripe/PayPal), and Technical Data (IP, AI risk logs).
sections.s2_title: 2. HOW DO WE PROCESS YOUR INFORMATION?
sections.s2_content: To facilitate campaigns, verify beneficiary authenticity, perform AI risk scoring, process donations, and comply with legal AML/KYC requirements.
sections.s3_title: 3. WHEN AND WITH WHOM DO WE SHARE YOUR DATA?
sections.s3_content: We share data with payment processors, identity verification services, AI model providers, and cloud hosting partners.
sections.s4_content: We use cookies to enhance your experience and monitor platform security.
sections.s5_content: If you link a social account, we access basic profile info permitted by the provider.
sections.s6_content: We keep data as long as necessary for fraud prevention, tax compliance, or service delivery.
sections.s7_content: We use enhanced encryption for sensitive medical and identity data with strict internal access controls.
sections.s8_content: We do not knowingly collect data from individuals under 18 without parental consent.
sections.s9_content: Under GDPR/CCPA, you can access, delete, or correct data. You have a right to human review of AI-driven fraud decisions.
sections.s10_content: We currently do not respond to DNT browser signals.
sections.s11_content: California residents have specific rights under CCPA regarding data access and non-discrimination.
sections.s12_content: We update this notice as regulations change or new features are added.
sections.s13_content: To request data deletion or review, contact our support team at the provided link.

terms.title: TERMS AND CONDITIONS
terms.agreement: By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. We function as an intermediary connecting verified beneficiaries with global donors.

sections.s1_content: You confirm you are at least 18 and agree to these legal terms.
sections.s2_content: Beneficiaries must provide accurate identity and medical documentation to register.
sections.s3_content: Donations are voluntary and processed via third-party gateways. They are generally non-refundable.
sections.s4_content: Mandatory authentication is required to prevent fraud. Campaigns are conditional upon approval.
sections.s5_content: We use AI for risk scoring. Suspicious activity triggers automatic suspension pending human review.
sections.s6_content: You grant us a license to host your campaign text and images for fundraising purposes.
sections.s7_content: Our verification algorithms and AI systems remain our exclusive property.
sections.s8_content: We may terminate accounts for misrepresentation of hardships or fraud.
sections.s9_content: The service is provided 'as is'. We do not guarantee the success of any campaign.
sections.s10_content: We are not liable for user fraud or medical outcomes of beneficiaries.
sections.s11_content: Governed by the laws of the State of Delaware, USA.

eula.licensing: This application is licensed to you by Donations Platform for use under these terms.
